name: Double Tappers
description:
This game was made as a prototype for mobile development, as it caught my interest. I don't think I'll ever finish this one, just something little to sink my fingers into. 

You click to shoot and then when you die you can upgrade your weapon damage and firerate (which seems almost redundant being on mobile) and if you're a fashionista you can change the skin of the weapon.

I think the weapon skins are my fav, although they are pretty thrown together.

Either way hope you enjoy playing it!
